subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych of the Czech Republic reached his second Swedish Open final in three years on Saturday, rallying past second-seeded Fernando Verdasco of Spain, 2-6, 6-3, 6-2, in Bastad.
snippet: Tomas Berdych of the Czech Republic reached his second Swedish Open final in three years on Saturday, rallying past second-seeded Fernando Verdasco of Spain, 2-6, 6-3, 6-2, in Bastad.
